io.reinert.requestor.core.serialization.misc

Class TextSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reinert.requestor.core.serialization.misc.TextSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer<String>, Serializer<String>

    public class TextSerializer
extends Object
implements Serializer<String>
    Pass-through serializer for plain text and generic media types.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

      • mediaType

        public String[] mediaType()
        Description copied from interface: Serializer
        Tells the media-type patterns which this serializer handles.

        E.g., a serializer for JSON can return {"application/json", "application/javascript"}.
        If you want to create a serializer for any media-type just return "*/*".
        Specified by:
        mediaType in interface Deserializer<String>
        Specified by:
        mediaType in interface Serializer<String>
        Returns:
        The media-type patterns handled by this serializer.

      • deserialize

        public <C extends Collection<String>> C deserialize(Class<C> collectionType,
                                                    SerializedPayload payload,
                                                    DeserializationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Deserializer
        Deserialize the plain text into a collection T.

        The collection instance can be retrieved from DeserializationContext.getInstance(Class).
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface Deserializer<String>
        Parameters:
        collectionType - The class of the collection
        payload - Http response body content

        The object deserialized
